amendment.description: To allow all Community Facility Program facility borrowers and grantees to enter into contracts with not-for-profit third parties for services consistent with the requirements of the Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2101 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2101 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Kohl. (consideration: CR S14007; text: CR S14007) To allow all Community Facility Program facility borrowers and grantees to enter into contracts with not-for-profit third parties for services consistent with the requirements of the Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2101 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2101 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Kohl.
